mapper.sql: id, name, chengfen, yongfa, zuoyong, fuzuoyong, price, baozhiqi, shenchanriqi, company, jixing
mapper.insert: insert into medical (id, name, chengfen, yongfa, zuoyong, fuzuoyong, price, baozhiqi, shenchanriqi, company, jixing) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chengfen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yongfa,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zuoyong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fuzuoyong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{baozhiqi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shenchanriqi,jdbcType=DATE}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jixing,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update medical
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
chengfen = #{chengfen,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
yongfa = #{yongfa,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zuoyong = #{zuoyong,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fuzuoyong = #{fuzuoyong,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
baozhiqi = #{baozhiqi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shenchanriqi = #{shenchanriqi,jdbcType=DATE},
company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jixing = #{jixing,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update medical set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chengfen = #{chengfen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yongfa = #{yongfa,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zuoyong = #{zuoyong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fuzuoyong = #{fuzuoyong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, baozhiqi = #{baozhiqi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shenchanriqi = #{shenchanriqi,jdbcType=DATE}, company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jixing = #{jixing,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from medical where name like "%"#{name}"%"
select * from medical where zuoyong like "%"#{zuoyong}"%"
